item.title: Rethinking Misalignment in Vision-Language Model Adaptation from a Causal Perspective
item.description: Vision-language model adaptation struggles with misalignment; this paper introduces Causality-Guided Semantic Decoupling and Classification (CDC) to mitigate this, boosting performance.
